languages.text: "Члены вашего культа создали для вас реликвию — алтарь, который совсем недавно доставили на корабль. Я счел необходимым позаботиться о том, чтобы вашим... занятиям... никто не мешал, и приказал установить его в потайной комнате при ваших покоях. Желаете ли взглянуть на него?"

traits.locale_text: "Члены вашего культа создали для вас реликвию — алтарь, который совсем недавно доставили на корабль. Я счел необходимым позаботиться о том, чтобы вашим... занятиям... никто не мешал, и приказал установить его в потайной комнате при ваших покоях. Желаете ли взглянуть на него?"

languages.text: "Followers of your cult have created a relic for you — an altar that was just recently delivered to the ship. I felt compelled to ensure that no one interrupted your... work... and had it placed in a secret room within your chambers. Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wish to see it?"
languages.original_text: "Члены вашего культа создали для вас реликвию — алтарь, который совсем недавно доставили на корабль. Я счел необходимым позаботиться о том, чтобы вашим... занятиям... никто не мешал, и приказал установить его в потайной комнате при ваших покоях. Желаете ли взглянуть на него?"

traits.locale_text: "Members of your cult created a relic for you, an altar that has just been recently delivered to the ship. I considered it necessary to make sure that no one would interrupt your... doings... and ordered to place it in a secret room of your chambers. Would you like to take a look at it?"

"Members of your cult created a relic for you, an altar that has just been recently delivered to the ship. I considered it necessary to make sure that no one would interrupt your... doings... and ordered to place it in a secret room of your chambers. Would you like to take a look at it?"

"Members of your cult created a relic for you — an altar that has just been recently delivered to the ship. I wanted to make sure that no one interrupted your... activities... and had it placed in a secret room of your chambers. Would you like to see it?"

"Members of your cult created a relic for you — an altar that has just been recently delivered to the ship. I wanted to make sure that no one interrupted your... activities... and had it placed in a secret room of your chambers. Would you like to see it?"

"Followers of your cult have created a relic for you — an altar that was just recently delivered to the ship. I felt compelled to ensure that no one interrupted your... work... and had it placed in a secret room within your chambers. Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wish to see it?"

languages.text: “您的教派信徒为您创造了一件圣物——那是一座祭坛，刚刚送到了船上。我斗胆认为，您一定不会希望您的……工作……受到干扰，于是我把它放在了您房间里的密室之中。您打算看看吗，大人？”
languages.original_text: "Followers of your cult have created a relic for you — an altar that was just recently delivered to the ship. I felt compelled to ensure that no one interrupted your... work... and had it placed in a secret room within your chambers. Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wish to see it?"

traits.locale_text: “您的教派信徒为您创造了一件圣物——那是一座祭坛，刚刚送到了船上。我斗胆认为，您一定不会希望您的……工作……受到干扰，于是我把它放在了您房间里的密室之中。您打算看看吗，大人？”

languages.text: « Les membres de votre culte ont créé une relique à votre intention, un autel qui a été récemment acheminé sur votre vaisseau. Je voulais veiller à ce que personne n'interrompe vos... activités... et je l'ai donc placé dans une pièce secrète de vos appartements. Voulez-vous le voir ? »
languages.original_text: "Members of your cult created a relic for you — an altar that has just been recently delivered to the ship. I wanted to make sure that no one interrupted your... activities... and had it placed in a secret room of your chambers. Would you like to see it?"

traits.locale_text: « Les membres de votre culte ont créé une relique à votre intention, un autel qui a été récemment acheminé sur votre vaisseau. Je voulais veiller à ce que personne n'interrompe vos... activités... et je l'ai donc placé dans une pièce secrète de vos appartements. Voulez-vous le voir ? »

languages.text: 「あなたの教団の信者が、あなたのために遺物を作りました。つい最近、船に届いたばかりの祭壇です。あなたの仕事を誰にも邪魔させないように…あなたの寝室の内にある秘密の部屋に置かせました。閣下はご覧になりましたか？」
languages.original_text: "Followers of your cult have created a relic for you — an altar that was just recently delivered to the ship. I felt compelled to ensure that no one interrupted your... work... and had it placed in a secret room within your chambers. Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wish to see it?"

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの教団の信者が、あなたのために遺物を作りました。つい最近、船に届いたばかりの祭壇です。あなたの仕事を誰にも邪魔させないように…あなたの寝室の内にある秘密の部屋に置かせました。閣下はご覧になりましたか？」

languages.text: «Los seguidores de su culto han creado una reliquia para usted: un altar que acaba de ser entregado en la nave. Para asegurarme de que nadie interrumpe sus... actividades... lo he instalado en una sala secreta en sus aposentos. ¿Le gustaría verlo, mi{mf|lord|lady}?».
languages.original_text: "Followers of your cult have created a relic for you — an altar that was just recently delivered to the ship. I felt compelled to ensure that no one interrupted your... work... and had it placed in a secret room within your chambers. Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wish to see it?"

traits.locale_text: «Los seguidores de su culto han creado una reliquia para usted: un altar que acaba de ser entregado en la nave. Para asegurarme de que nadie interrumpe sus... actividades... lo he instalado en una sala secreta en sus aposentos. ¿Le gustaría verlo, mi{mf|lord|lady}?».

languages.text: "Mitglieder Eures Kults haben ein Relikt für Euch erschaffen — einen Altar, der kürzlich auf das Schiff gebracht wurde. Ich wollte sichergehen, dass niemand Eure ... Aktivitäten ... unterbricht, und habe ihn in einen geheimen Raum Eurer Gemächer bringen lassen. Möchtet Ihr ihn sehen?"
languages.original_text: "Members of your cult created a relic for you — an altar that has just been recently delivered to the ship. I wanted to make sure that no one interrupted your... activities... and had it placed in a secret room of your chambers. Would you like to see it?"

traits.locale_text: "Mitglieder Eures Kults haben ein Relikt für Euch erschaffen — einen Altar, der kürzlich auf das Schiff gebracht wurde. Ich wollte sichergehen, dass niemand Eure ... Aktivitäten ... unterbricht, und habe ihn in einen geheimen Raum Eurer Gemächer bringen lassen. Möchtet Ihr ihn sehen?"
